subject: Gilberto here
body:
You have one voicemail message waiting for you. Hear how you can earn green from your phone.

Oh the sun is shining and things are better each day.

I get to stay home and relax on my porch while I simply return phone calls
each day. This can be you also if you want it to be.

The potential to generate up to $3OOO each week is there
so pick up that telephone and call my information line.

800-691-4552




Get back to me via Crocker4Crocker@compoze.com if not lnterested





If the black box flight recorder is never damaged during a plane crash, why isn't the whole airplane made out of the stuff?
